name: Avcı Yayı
desc: Bir avcının şarkısında iki nota olur: Gerilen yayın sesi ve okların ıslığı.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Süt Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius' wolf pack is its blessed honor guard, and even the milk teeth of a wolf cub possess great potential.
In the past, the gods had the responsibility to love all people. Andrius was therefore quite unusual in that he became leader of the wolves, while only welcoming abandoned babies and wanderers when it came to humans.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Dalı
materials.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

materials.name: Hazine Avcısı Nişanı
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Çatlak Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Dalı
materials.desc: Fragile branches from deep within the earth. Even after years of aging, from beneath it's mottled surface you can see that its power is not yet entirely lost.

materials.name: Hazine Avcısı Nişanı
materials.desc: A signet that proudly represents its owner's position as member of the Treasure Hoarders. The pursuit of treasure knows no bounds. That said... Is being a thief something to be proud of?

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Çatlak Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The life of a wolf is not without violence; broken bones or cracked teeth are nothing special.
Andrius found humans to be a disappointment, but believed babies to be innocent. If both the wolf pack and the adopted children chose each other, then they become a Lupical, a fated family.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Yaprakları
materials.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

materials.name: Gümüş Kuzgun Nişanı
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

materials.name: Kutup Kurdunun Kırık Dişi
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The wolf pack also understands that humans are not solitary creatures. The honorary broken tooth is a parting gift said to bring protection and luck.
In the legends of a far-off world, a female wolf once adopted two great humans. Their home was known as the Cave of Wolves, or Lupercal - that word meaning the same thing as Lupical does in this world.

materials.name: Kuru Ley Hattı Yaprakları
materials.desc: A twig from deep within the earth. Though it is far from where it once lay, its leaves still pulsate with energy.

materials.name: Gümüş Kuzgun Nişanı
materials.desc: A raven insignia used by members of the Treasure Hoarders to identify each other. The Treasure Hoarders ask for no resume. Anyone who has an insatiable desire for treasure and is backed up by an equal amount of courage can become a worthy member.

value.text:
Hazine Sandıkları
Dilek aracılığıyla yeni bir Karakter elde edilirse Karakter ile birlikte gelir.

desc.text:
Efsaneye göre, Mondstadt bir zamanlar yay kirişinden şarkı çalan birini ağırlamış.
Belki de bu göçebe müzisyenin, ok atmak için bir enstrümanın yaylarını kullandığını söylemek daha doğru olur.
Ama bu, eski bir halk efsanesinden ibarettir.
